text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC I am confused as to why you need a convention when you are the only one running.  Haven't you spread COVID-19 enough with your rallies already?  #TrumpIsASuperSpreader  Gov. Cooper showed his care for the people, something that you have never done.  #TrumpIsKillingUs
